void activatedSlot (int socket)

Detailed Description

SocketNotifer wraps filedescriptors so that they can be used in Qt's event loop. A SocketNotifer can only be used for a single file descriptor and a single event (read or write).

Bindings info:
lib_name:'SocketNotifier_core' super: 'QObject'
